name: Pug's Coco Island
description:
Build your coconut business in a small island, from the ground up!
(Note: Crafting is not yet available, but feel free to explore and play around the island.)

Gameplay

Gather materials from one source - the Coconut Tree, and use that to craft or construct items and mechanisms to create and sell your mama's specialty - CocoDrops, a sweet snack that you enjoyed as a young pug.

Game design and gameplay were inspired by games like:

  • Animal Crossing
  • Overcooked
  • This War of Mine
  • Cities: Skylines
  • Dragon Quest Builders
  • and of course, Harvest Moon
Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • SHIFT (hold) - Sprint
  • E - Interact
  • ESC - Pause Menu
Misc Info

Created within 7 days for BTP Game Jam 3 with the theme "Less is More."
All graphic assets were done from scratch, sound effects were from previous projects, while music I used were from free-to-use sources.

Definitely had fun creating this game, will surely continue to develop it.
